Name: Quick Packer 2
About the game: Collect items and pack them as compact and/or as fast as possible into a packing container on a truck! You can select different challenges to play the game how you want. Fast paced action or slow and relaxing atmosphere are both possible. Quick Packer 2 is a remake and improvement of the original ludum dare game by the same developer.
Meta Title: Quick Packer 2: Apr 18, 2021, Spencer and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Quick Packer 2? Check out the release date (Apr 18, 2021), developer insights from Spencer, and a complete game summary.
